Audio.Locality: Bahia, Fazenda Bom Jesus, near Una
Audio.Author: Frank Lambert
Audio.Comments: Previously published on AVoCet as AV8193. Certainty: slightly less than 100%. ID determined by: Narration: drumming by what appears to be. GPS: estimate from Google Earth. Habitat: in cabruca, in small tangles of vine stems with no real leaf vegetation about 8 m off the ground in a small tree with fairly dense canopy.
